Text: ....aye man iz dis already cracked???...ready to go???

Thanks "mrriser007" ... works, no problems, great up.

To "ORgAn1zEd" and/or others a bit perplexed by the activator (avs4you.all.products.activator.2012.v1.0-MPT.exe), I admit, it perplexed even me for a moment.  However, just know I selected/input a date one year out, then clicked on the graphic/icon to execute the activation.

Today's the best day of my life ... and NOW you're part of it!"
Craig AKA TheGeekinator
Note that the program must be in the default directory chosen by the installer or the activator will not work.
